import React from 'react'; import './SolutionPage.css'; export default function CallAnsweringService() { return (

24/7 Call Answering Service

Rosie ensures you never miss a call, day or night. Our AI-powered answering service is always available to greet your customers, take messages, and provide information.

Key Features

  • 24/7 live call answering
  • Custom greetings and scripts
  • Instant message delivery
  • Spam and robocall filtering
  • Appointment scheduling and reminders
  • Multi-language support
  • Call routing and escalation

How It Works

When a customer calls your business, Rosie answers with a personalized greeting, collects important information, and delivers messages to you instantly. You can customize scripts, FAQs, and escalation rules to fit your workflow.

Benefits

  • Never miss a sales opportunity or urgent call
  • Reduce interruptions and focus on your work
  • Improve customer satisfaction with fast, professional responses
  • Save money compared to traditional answering services

Customer Testimonials

“Rosie has transformed how we handle calls. Our customers love the quick response, and we never lose business after hours.”
- Jane D., Small Business Owner
); }
